ï»¿STA TUTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, Internation, 1 Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee inder Section 4 (iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the Proposed Loan (Dr :ught Events' Impact Mitigating Investment Project Financing) to the National Developr ient Corporation (Corporaci6n para el Dessarrollo) to be guaranteed by the Oriental Republic of Uruguay. The undersigned Commit ee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bz:nk for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grant to the National Development Corporation (Corporacidn para el Dessarrollo) (the Borrower) a loan in an amount of $200,000,000, which loan is to be guaranteed by the Oriental Republic of Uruguay (the Guarantor). The purposes of said loan are to: (i) to enhance the Guaranto:'s efforts to mitigate the effect of adverse weather conditions on its public sector accounts; and (ii) enhancing the efficiency of its risk management framework used to mitigate the:;e risks. 1. The Committee has careft Ily studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purposes to which the proceeds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the Project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be applied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said Project is designed to promote the development of the productive .acilities and resources of the Oriental Republic of Uruguay and is in the interest of the Oriental Republic of Uruguay and of the members of the Bank as a whole.
ï»¿-2- Oriental Republic of Uruguay (Drought Events' Impact Mitigating Investment Project Financing) 3. Accordingly, the Commit ee finds that said Project merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends s iid Project for such assistance. COMMITTEE Senior Vice President and Group General Counsel Expert Selected by Govemor for the Oriental Republic of Uruguay Regional Vice President Latin America and the Caribbean Dated at Washington, D. C.
